Title: Establishes requirements for resettling, transporting or relocating certain migrants to other municipalities
Summary: Imposes consultation and reporting requirements for municipal corporations resettling, transporting or relocating non-detained migrants to another municipal corporation within the state, which is directed, administered, or funded by the federal government, the secretary of health and human services in the case of minors, the secretary of homeland security in the case of adults, or any municipal corporation within the state or agents thereof.
LawCode: Add ยง99-aa, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to establishing requirements for resettling, transporting or relocating certain migrants to other municipalities
